ygData.subject: RE: [EverQuest] Re: Active servers?
ygData.msgSnippet: Any Tribunal players out there?  I m trying to get back into the game myself.  Just started a newbie Druid named Rhnias ( a Drak ) I popped into Nexus...
ygData.messageBody:
Any Tribunal players out there? I'm trying to get back into the game
myself. Just started a newbie Druid named Rhnias ( a Drak )
I popped into Nexus... empty, I popped into Butcher Block...empty...
Dawnshroud Peak... empty....Freeport.... empty.... it was surreal. I
haven't played since Planes of Power came out and the only place I saw
any activity was Plane of Knowledge =( This was all at different times
over the weekend.

Hope everyone is doing great!
D. Scott Smith

I don't miss some of the insane crowds but empty... that just gave me
chills.


--- In EverQuest@yahoogroups.com, "Thomas Houseman" <thomas@...> wrote:
>
> Send a tell to Tuvarilo, I'll help you out with some plat etc.
>
> T.

a
